description:
http://anidb.net/ch149582 [Yakou Shizuka], a quiet and bashful woman, works at a detective agency. Her boss http://anidb.net/ch149583 [Tounome], who owns the company, is the gentlemanly type, kind and dapper, though he has an extra talent—he`s invisible! His special ability is perfect for detective work, but he quickly comes to find it doesn`t work on Yakou, who is blind and always knows if he`s near. Charmed, Tounome is determined to get her to date him and isn`t against using his many skills. Yakou`s quirky coworkers, a contrarian human man and a sisterly beastwoman, kindly watch over her as she stumbles and blushes through the uncharted waters of office romance.
Source: Seven Seas Entertainment

titles.title: Toumei Otoko to Ningen Onna: Sonouchi Fuufu ni Naru Futari
The Invisible Man and His Soon-to-Be Wife
透明男と人間女~そのうち夫婦になるふたり~
